N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 820.4 - Table i

State Regulations
TABLE I
CLASSIFICATION AND STANDARDS OF QUALITY AND PURITY
ASSIGNED TO FRESH SURFACE WATERS WITHIN THE LOWER GENESEE RIVER DRAINAGE BASIN
IN MONROE COUNTY, NEW YORK
Item No. Waters Index

Number

Name

Description

Map Ref. No. Class

Standards
1

Ont.117 portion as described

Genesee River

From natural mouth at its junction with Lake

Ontario to Barge Canal Dam at Court Street, Rochester. B
B
2

Ont. 117 portion as described

Genesee River

Barge Canal Dam to south limits of Barge Canal, where Barge Canal crosses Genesee River in City of Rochester. B
B
3

Ont. 117-1 and tribs., including P 1a, P 1b

Tributary of Genesee River

Enters Genesee River from east approximately 0.7
mile above mouth. Ponds are located just west of St. Paul Boulevard. 2
C
C
4

Ont. 117-2 including P 1

Tributary of Genesee River

Enters west side of Genesee River opposite

Rattlesnake Point. Pond is located just west of New York Central Railroad. 2
C
C
5

Ont. 117-P 2a, P 2b

Tributaries of Genesee River

Ponds located in Riverside Cemetery and Holy

Sepulcher Cemetery, respectively. 2
C
C
6

Ont. 117-P 2c

Tributary of Genesee River

Pond located on grounds of St. Bernards

Seminary. 2
C
C
7

Ont. 117-P 2d

Tributary of Genesee River

Pond located 0.2 mile west of Genesee River and 0.3
mile northwest of Veterans Memorial Bridge. 2
B
B
8

Ont. 117-3 and trib. including P 1c

Tributary of Genesee River

Enters Genesee River from east 0.2 mile south of

Rattlesnake Point. P 1c is at source of trib. 2
C
C
9

Ont. 117-4 including P 2

Tributary of Genesee River

Enters from southeast opposite Riverside Cemetery. Pond is at source of stream. 2
B
B

Tributary of Genesee River

From Truesdale Street to source. (Stream enters
sewer at Truesdale Street.)
2

C

Ont. 117-6

Enters from southeast 0.2 mile south of Veterans

C
13

Tributary of Genesee River

From Mount Read Boulevard to source. (Stream enters
sewer at Mount Read Boulevard 0.3 mile north of Lyell Avenue.)
2
C
C
15

Ont. 117-P 8a

Tributary of Genesee River

Isolated pond located west of South Avenue just
opposite Highland Hospital. 2

Tributary of Genesee River
